XmlContent: <TaskV2 clsid="{D8896631-B747-47a7-84A6-C155337F3BC8}" name="Remove Local FW rules" image="0" changed="2022-11-21 00:04:36" uid="BE6FE4E7-1EC3-4728-A3C8-461F5BFBA1A2" userContext="0" removePolicy="0">
<Properties action="C" name="Remove Local FW rules" runAs="NT AUTHORITY\System" logonType="S4U">
<Description>Local Rules have no effect (are disabled), but should be removed to make that visable</Description>
<Description>Restarts the nlasvc (the most ironically named service ever) if the domain profile isn't connected, every 1 minute for a period of 5 mintes after boot</Description>
<Arguments>-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "(& netsh advfirewall show currentprofile)[1] | % { if ($_ -notmatch '^Domain') { Restart-Service -Name 'nlasvc' -force}}"</Arguments>

<Shortcut clsid="{4F2F7C55-2790-433e-8127-0739D1CFA327}" name="BGInfoConfig" status="BGInfoConfig" image="1" userContext="0" bypassErrors="1" changed="2022-11-21 00:04:36" uid="29F53FAE-450F-4625-A4DB-04BE59AC3BCA">

<Properties pidl="" targetType="FILESYSTEM" action="R" comment="" shortcutKey="0" startIn="" arguments="%SYSTEMROOT%\bg.bgi /timer:0 /nolicprompt /silent" iconIndex="0" targetPath="%ALLUSERSPROFILE%\chocolatey\lib\bginfo\Tools\Bginfo64.exe" iconPath="" window="MIN" shortcutPath="%CommonStartUpDir%\BGInfoConfig" />
